divinity.name: Apollo
divinity.heading: God of Music
divinity.description: Your Move: Your Worker may move into an opponent Worker’s space by forcing their Worker to the space yours just vacated.

divinity.name: Artemis
divinity.heading: Goddess of the Hunt
divinity.description: Your Move: Your Worker may move one additional time, but not back to its initial space.

divinity.name: Athena
divinity.heading: Goddess of Wisdom
divinity.description: Opponent’s Turn: If one of your Workers moved up on your last turn, opponent Workers cannot move up this turn.

divinity.name: Atlas
divinity.heading: Titan Shouldering the Heavens
divinity.description: Your Build: Your Worker may build a dome at any level.

divinity.name: Demeter
divinity.heading: Goddess of the Harvest
divinity.description: Your Build: Your Worker may build one additional time, but not on the same space.

divinity.name: Hephaestus
divinity.heading: God of Blacksmiths
divinity.description: Your Build: Your Worker may build one additional block (not dome) on top of your first block.

divinity.name: Minotaur
divinity.heading: Bull-headed Monster
divinity.description: Your Move: Your Worker may move into an opponent Worker’s space, if their Worker can be forced one space straight backwards to an unoccupied space at any level.

divinity.name: Pan
divinity.heading: God of the Wild
divinity.description: Win Condition: You also win if your Worker moves down two or more levels.

divinity.name: Prometheus
divinity.heading: Titan Benefactor of Mankind
divinity.description: Your Turn: If your Worker does not move up, it may build both before and after moving.
